column1: Art Institute of Chicago////But man -- this museum deserves the accolades.  It seems like every picture one studies in Art Appreciation 101 is here!  Wood's 'American Gothic
column4: Picasso's The Old Guitarist... the list goes on.  It appears that all the impressionists are represented
column5: topped off by Rembrandt and the old masters
column6: Egyptian antiquities -- virtually everything that should be in an art museum is here.
